abstracts.cdata!:
This safeguards framework for the
            Infrastructure Reconstruction Financing Facility Project in
            Indonesia covers the Infrastructure Reconstruction Enabling
            Program (IREP) and Infrastructure Reconstruction Financing
            Facility (IRFF). It provides general policies and guidelines
            to serve the following objectives: a) protect human health;
            b) prevent environmental degradation; c) enhance positive
            environmental outcomes; d) avoid or minimize land
            acquisition and involuntary resettlement; e) avoid conflict
            among community members and strengthen community social
            cohesiveness. The report covers the environmental and social
            issues which triggered the necessity for a framework, what
            conditions will necessitate a full environmental assessment,
            and a screening process for subprojects. Due to the
            existence of indigenous minorities in Nias, the framework
            provides general guidelines in relation to indigenous
            peoples policies.
